mapper.select: select a.*, b.thumbnail, b.name from schedule a left outer join stadium b on a.stadium_id=b.id WHERE game_date > sysdate
mapper.insert: insert into schedule(id, stadium_id, owner_id, start_time, end_time, price, game_date) values(schedule_seq.nextval, #{stadium_id}, #{owner_id}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{price}, #{game_date})
